    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    ActiveReservationsController
    Controller class for the Active Reservations management view.
    BaseMenuController
    Abstract base controller that defines the shared session state for the Bistro UI.
    Bill
    Represents a financial record of a transaction in the Bistro system.
    CancelWaitingListController
    Controller class responsible for handling the cancellation of waiting list entries in the database.
    CardReaderController
    Client-side controller for the Card Reader module in the Bistro system.
    CardReaderDBController
     
    CardReaderHandler
    Handler that manages the Card Reader logic on the server.
    CardReaderView
    The CardReaderView class provides a graphical simulation of a restaurant card reader terminal.
    ChatClient
    The ChatClient class serves as the core communication bridge on the client side, implementing the logic defined by the OCSF framework for the Bistro system.
    ChatIF
    The ChatIF interface defines the communication contract for the Client-side User Interface (UI) in the Bistro system.
    CreateOrderController
    The CreateOrderController handles the core Server-side business logic for allocating restaurant tables and managing the reservation lifecycle.
    CreateOrderHandler
    The CreateOrderHandler class manages the "CREATE_RESERVATION" command.
    CreateSubscriberHandler
    Handler responsible for the business logic of registering a new subscriber.
    CurrentDinersController
    Controller class for the "Current Diners" management view in the Bistro system.
    DBController
    The DBController class serves as the central database manager for the server-side application.
    DBOccasionalConnection
    The DBOccasionalConnection class manages the data access logic for Guest (Occasional) customers.
    DBReservationsHistoryController
    Database controller responsible for retrieving reservation history data.
    DBSubscriberConnection
    The DBSubscriberConnection class provides the database access logic specifically for the Subscriber authentication flow.
    DBSubscriberDetails
    The DBSubscriberDetails class provides methods to update personal information across the 'subscriber' and 'user' relational tables.
    DeleteSpecialHoursHandler
    Handler class responsible for deleting all special operating hours.
    EditDetailsHandler
    Handles server-side logic for editing subscriber personal details.
    EditSubscriberDetailsController
    Controller for editing subscriber profile details in the Bistro system.
    ExitWaitingListHelper
    Utility helper class for managing waiting list removal operations in the Bistro system.
    GenerateSubReportsHandler
    Handler responsible for generating subscriber reports on the server side.
    GenerateTimeReportsHandler
    Handler responsible for generating time reports (average delays per day).
    GetWaitingListHandler
    Handler responsible for fetching the current waiting list.
    ICustomerActions
    Behavioral contract for customer-related activities in the Bistro system.
    ILoginDatabase
    The ILoginDatabase interface defines the formal contract for all database operations related to user authentication and guest registration.
    JoinWaitingListDBController
    Handles database operations related to the waiting_list_entry table.
    JoinWaitingListHandler
    Handler responsible for processing join waiting list requests from terminal clients.
    LoginSource
    Defines the possible origins of a login request within the Bistro system.
    ManagerDashboardController
    Controller for the Manager Dashboard in the Bistro system.
    ManageReservationController
    Controller class for the Manage Reservation screen at the physical Service Terminal.
    ManageTablesController
    Controller class for the Table Management interface.
    MonthSelectionController
    Controller class for the Month Selection interface.
    NewReservationController
    Controller for the New Reservation interface in the Bistro system.
    OccasionalLoginController
    Integrated controller for the Occasional (Guest) Login screen.
    OccasionalLoginHandler
    Specialized handler for the Occasional (Guest) Customer login process.
    OccasionalMenuController
    The OccasionalMenuController serves as the main dashboard for Guest (Occasional) users in the Bistro system.
    OccasionalRegistrationController
    Controller class for the Occasional Customer Registration interface in the Bistro system.
    OccasionalRegistrationHandler
    The OccasionalRegistrationHandler class is responsible for managing the server-side workflow for new guest registration.
    OccasionalRestUsernameHandler
    The OccasionalRestUsernameHandler class manages the server-side process for resetting a guest customer's username.
    PayBillEntryController
    Controller for the initial payment entry screen in the Bistro system.
    PaymentController
    Controller class responsible for handling payment-related database operations.
    PaymentUIController
    Controller for the Payment UI screen in the Bistro system.
    RemoteClientUI
    Main entry point for the Bistro Remote Access client application.
    RemoteLoginController
    Controller for the integrated Remote Login screen.
    reportsDBController
     
    RepresentativeDashboardController
    Controller class for the Representative Dashboard.
    RepresentativeDashboardController.DayScheduleRow
    Inner helper class to represent a row in the operating hours schedule table.
    Reservation
    The Reservation class represents a data transfer object (DTO) for restaurant bookings.
    Reservation.ReservationStatus
    Enum representing the various states a reservation can hold.
    ReservationHistoryController
    Controller for the Reservation History screen in the Bistro system.
    ReservationHistoryHandler
    Handles server-side logic for fetching the reservation history of a specific subscriber.
    Restaurant
    Core Domain Entity representing a Restaurant in the system.
    RestaurantDBController
    The RestaurantDBController is a specialized data access object (DAO) responsible for reconstructing a complete Restaurant domain entity from the database.
    RestaurantManager
    The RestaurantManager class acts as a global access point and an In-Memory Cache for the restaurant's configuration data.
    SeatingAvailabilityController
    Provides capacity-based availability checks for immediate seating.
    ServerController
    The ServerController class is the central communication hub for the Bistro Server.
    ServerIF
    yanivvvvvvvvv The ServerIF interface defines a communication contract between the server's backend logic and its User Interface (UI).
    ServerPortFrameController
     
    ServerUI
     
    ServiceResponse
    ServiceResponse serves as a generic communication envelope for messages sent from the Server to the Client in the Bistro system.
    ServiceResponse.ServiceStatus
    Enum defining the specific outcomes of a reservation request handled by the Server.
    SubReportGraphController
    Controller class for visualizing Subscriber Activity reports.
    Subscriber
    Represents a registered subscriber in the Bistro system.
    SubscriberDBController
    Database controller responsible for retrieving subscriber data.
    SubscriberLoginController
    Integrated controller for the Subscriber Login screen.
    SubscriberLoginHandler
    Specialized handler for the Subscriber login process on the server side.
    SubscriberMenuController
    The SubscriberMenuController acts as the primary dashboard for authenticated subscribers in the Bistro system.
    SubscribersListController
    Controller class for the Subscribers List management view.
    Table
    Represents a physical dining table within the Bistro restaurant system.
    TableDBController
    Database access controller for restaurant table management.
    TerminalClientUI
    Main entry point for the Bistro Customer Service Terminal application.
    TerminalLoginController
    Integrated TerminalLoginController.
    TerminalMenuController
    Controller for the main Customer Service Terminal menu.
    TerminalWaitingListSizeController
    Controller for the Waiting List size selection screen at the service terminal.
    TimeRange
    Utility class representing a specific time interval (e.g., Opening Hours).
    TimeReportGraphController
    Controller class for visualizing Time and Stay Duration reports.
    UpdateHoursHandler
    Handler class responsible for updating restaurant operating hours.
    UpdateManagementDBController
    Controller for managing database updates for the restaurant management system.
    UpdateSpecialHoursHandler
    Handler class responsible for processing special operating hours updates.
    viewReservationController
    Controller class responsible for handling database operations related to viewing and managing reservations.
    ViewReservationController
    Controller class for the View Reservation screen in the Bistro system.
    Visit
    Represents a customer's visit to the Bistro restaurant.
    Visit.VisitStatus
    Enumeration defining the possible lifecycle states of a restaurant visit.
    VisitController
    VisitController handles the arrival logic and seating transactions at the Terminal.
    VisitDBController
    Controller class for handling visit-related database operations.
    VisitScheduler
    Scheduler responsible for handling delayed visit-related tasks.
    VisitUIController
    Controller class for the Arrival Terminal interface.
    WaitingListController
    WaitingListController handles the logic for managing the restaurant's waiting list queue.
    WaitingListController
    Controller for the Waiting List sub-screen within the management dashboard.
    WaitingListEntry
    Represents a customer on the restaurant's waiting list.
    WaitingListEntry.WaitingStatus
    Enumeration of valid statuses for a waiting list entry.
    WaitingListScheduler
    Scheduler responsible for handling waiting list timeout operations.
    X
